mapper.select: select b.cnt , m.movie_num, b.movie_num from (select count(movie_num) cnt , movie_num from BOOKLIST group by movie_num) b, movie m where b.movie_num = m.movie_num order by b.cnt
select movie_title, movie_num from movie order by movie_title ASC

select THEATER_NUM, MOVIE_NUM, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_AREA, THEATER_ADD1, THEATER_ADD2 from THEATER
where theater_add1 = #{theaterAdd1} and theater_add2 = #{theaterAdd2}
